response.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:SOAP-ENV='http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/' xmlns:xsi='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance' xmlns:s='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema'><SOAP-ENV:Body><MissionResponse xmlns="http://tempuri.org"><MissionResult>Enabling individuals and businesses to manage intelligent wireless voice-enabled marketing services for the Entertainment industry.</MissionResult></MissionResponse></SOAP-ENV:Body></SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
